alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 19 at 1:13PM MST until February 19 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Far Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM MST this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles along I-25.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
